questions.question: Considering the overall packaging design, what is the primary color scheme used to visually highlight the product name and brand?

Based on the visual elements of the packaging, what is the brand name prominently displayed on the carton?
What is the predominant color of the text used to label the product's type on the carton?
Looking at the product image, what appears to be the material of the primary packaging used to contain the product?
Judging by the visual representation of the product, what seems to be the overall texture of the packaging?
Focusing on the image, what is the apparent state of the product being shown—as in, liquid or solid?
From a visual standpoint, what is the depicted method of consumption of the product in the illustration provided?
Based solely on what is visibly represented, what color is the product depicted in the lower portion of the carton?
What is the type of processing as visually communicated on the product's packaging?

What is the color of the seal or cap present at the top of the product container?
